P004670.project_name: Electricity Generating Authority of Thailand (EGAT) Power Project

keywords.cdata: basic,civil works,Construction,Construction equipment,covers,dams,duty,economics,electric power,Electrical equipment,ELECTRICITY,energy production,Engineering,engineering,Engineering Consultants,excavation,Export,foreign investment,fuel,fuel cost,goal,hydroelectric resources,Irrigation,Lignite,lining,load factors,motion,power consumption,power generation,power production,power sector,Power supplies,range,reference,reserve,reservoirs,rig,rim,River,river diversion,signs,spring,square,switch,tower,tunnel,valves,voltage,widening

project_abstract.cdata: The project forms part of EGAT's construction program for the period 1969-1976, and consists of the installation of a third unit (310 Mw) at the South Bangkok Thermal Station with the necessary auxiliary equipment and controls; a power plant at the Sirikit dam consisting of two 125 Mw hydraulic turbine generator units, a switching station with associated controls and related civil works; a 230 Kv transmission line of about 250 km from the Sirikit dam to Nakorn Sawan; and engineering services.

P004670.docty: Loan Agreement,Guarantee Agreement,Memorandum & Recommendation of the President
